attributes.action: Make the government force schools to recognise aspergers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Earlier diagnosis for Aspergers in children. They often have to wait for several years before diagnosis, and the earlier a dagnosis is made. the better for the child, family, and school.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
